ID: C9IHCE8_00
From: Marina Larisa <Marina.Larisa@tarzlifestyle.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: L'Occitane En Provence Dubai Hills Mall <loccitane.dubaihills@Loccitane.me>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-07 07:25
Subject: Fw: Store insurance
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop ,

Appreciate if you could please check and advise on the below 

Best regards,
Marina 

Get Outlook for iOS <https://aka.ms/o0ukef> 
________________________________

From: L'Occitane En Provence Dubai Hills Mall <loccitane.dubaihills@Loccitane.me>
Sent: Sunday, April 6, 2025 9:29 PM
To: Marina Larisa <Marina.Larisa@tarzlifestyle.com>
Subject: Store insurance 
 

Dear Marina.

 

Hope my e-mail finds you well.

On 23.March we had water leakage in our back office due to water heater malfunctioning. After the incident our music system stopped working and contractors fees start from 750aed. Is it covered under insurance and can it be claimed after full repairs please? With another note, will it cover water heater replacement as well?

 

Please advise,

 

With thanks,

Tiina

On 23.March we had water leakage in our back office due to water heater malfunctioning. After the incident our music system stopped working and contractors fees start from 750aed. Tiina


--------------------------------------------------
ID: C9IHCE8_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Marina Larisa <Marina.Larisa@tarzlifestyle.com>
CC: L'Occitane En Provence Dubai Hills Mall <loccitane.dubaihills@Loccitane.me>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-07 12:03
Subject: RE: Store insurance
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Marina,

 

We have a deductible of USD 2,000 for water damages.

 

As such, the claim falls below the excess and cannot be claimed.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​
